Entries.NPC.cs.3956: Is this a stupid prank or something? No.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.3957: I'm gonna pretend you didn't just try to give me that. Now, piss off.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.3958: Uh... what the fuck? I barely even know you.
Entries.NPC.cs.3959: Uh... do you even know what that thing means?#$b#Maybe you should go look it up before passing those out.
Entries.NPC.cs.3960: %Shane refuses to make eye contact with you.
Entries.NPC.cs.3961: %Shane refuses to make eye contact with you.
Entries.NPC.cs.3962: ...Wait, seriously?$10#$b#...You want... with me? I... uh... yes, please.$10#$e#%Shane covers his face.#$e#Hooooo boy. Okay, um... you're serious, right? You wanna get more serious with me?$6#$b#I just can't believe you actually feel...$h#$b#Okay, um. I... I'll see you around, @.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: ...Wait, seriously?$10#$b#...You want... with me? I... uh... yes, please.$10#$e#%Shane covers his face.#$e#Hooooo boy. Okay, um... you're serious, right? You wanna get more serious with me?$6#$b#I just can't believe you actually feel...$h#$b#Okay, um. I... I'll see you around, @.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3965: You just got engaged! What are you thinking?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: What? Didn't you just ask someone else to marry you? You're crazy!$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3972: I--what..?$10#$b#@... Sorry, but I can't. Not right now.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3973: No!$10#$b#I mean--look, I'm sorry. I don't feel that way about you.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3974: Look. I already told you no! Leave me alone.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.3975: You already asked me that. What part of 'NO' don't you understand?!$a
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: ...!!!$10#$b#No fucking way!? Wait no, I mean yes, I absolutely do want to marry you.$10#$b#Yes. I wanna marry you. Sorry I freaked out, I just... can't believe that this is actually happening...$l#$b#I'll set everything up. We'll have the ceremony in 3 days, okay?$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: I've never been good with words, so I wanted to give you that stardrop.$l#$b#How it made you feel... well, that's how I feel when I'm with you.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4439: It kinda freaks me out knowing how much the new baby will change things...$3#$b#But everything will work out, right?$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: I hope our adoption request gets approved. They'll see that we can raise a kid right, right?
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: Hey @, I just filed our adoption papers. That took way more forms than I thought it would take.#$b#*sigh*... Bureaucracy is such a hassle.$s#$b#I know it's gonna be worth it, though.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: Hm... we're gonna have to go shopping for supplies soon. You know, for baby stuff.$6#$b#Jas used to have this mobile hanging over her crib when she was a baby. Maybe we should get something like that.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: Hm... we're gonna have to go shopping for supplies soon. You know, for baby stuff.$6#$b#Jas used to have this mobile hanging over her crib when she was a baby. Maybe we should get something like that.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: ...You're pregnant?$10#$b#Holy shit, we're having a baby!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: I need a fucking minute to myself...  Check on the kids yourself.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4462: I got up early and watered some crops for you. I hope it makes your job a little easier today.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4470: I got up early to water some crops, but they were already done. I keep forgetting about that sweet sprinkler setup we've got.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4474: I got up early and fed all the farm animals. I hope that makes your job a little easier today.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4481: I couldn't sleep, so I got up and repaired a few of the fences. They should be as good as new.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4500: Your stuff's all over the place, bud. Could you tidy it up?#$b#I don't know where you usually store all that.

Entries.Event.cs.1500: It's nothing fancy, but yeah. I hope you like it, anyway.$6

Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_SecondChild1: Just look at our family... We've come a long way, haven't we?$6
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_SecondChild2: Three great kids... We've come a long way, haven't we?$6
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_Adoption: So, you ready to be the best parents %kid1 could ever have?$6#$b#It's a pretty tall order, but I think we'll manage.$h
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_FirstChild: So, you ready to be the best parents %kid1 could ever have?$6#$b#It's a pretty tall order, but I think we'll manage.$h
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Spouse_KitchenBlocked: You've got a bunch of your stuff blocking the kitchen... I don't know where you wanna keep all that, so could you tidy it up?
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Spouse_MonstersInHouse: Uh... peach? What the fuck are these monsters doing in here?
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! What the fuck happened down there? Can you walk?$10
You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! What the fuck happened down there? Can you walk?$10

Entries.ExtraDialogue_Town_DumpsterDiveComment_A: I'm just... gonna forget I saw anything.
Uh... you want me to get you some hand sanitizer or something, {{Random: chickadee, bud, peach, @}}?

Entries.Characters_WipedMemory: Uh... hey.#$e#Don't take this the wrong way, but do I know you?
